author: Jon Fingas
title: YouTube will remove videos falsely linking COVID-19 to 5G
description: The rash of bogus conspiracy theories tying the COVID-19 pandemic to 5G has led to cell tower arson and threats against engineers, and YouTube is planning to crack down on that misinformation.  The Google-owned service said it will remove videos that try to m…
content: Instead, YouTube said it was suppressing "borderline content" that could mislead people in "harmful ways," such as conspiracy theories surrounding 5G and the virus by themselves. This includes both reduced recommendations for videos, pulling them from search … [+784 chars]
